=Retrieve,Dir=

==Syntax==
{{{
Retrieve,Dir,<DirectoryOrFilename>,<%var%> 
}}}
This function will display a dialog box asking the user to select a folder. Once a value is selected and the user clicks "Ok" to close the box, this value will be stored inside %var%
 * You can specify where the initially selected folder is placed.
 * %var% is a user defined variable containing the full path of the selected directory.

== Syntax example: ==
 You can use this example to open a dialog box asking the user to select a folder. This box will start in `c:\`. Once a file is selected, the %var% will contain the full path of this selected directory. 
{{{
Retrieve,Dir,c:\,%var%
}}}
